availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Charles Wesley Honaker (Bath County, Kentucky, grocery keeper.)

body.p: Bath County, Kentucky, grocery keeper. Kentucky native. Married to Margaret Jane Honaker. Father of John W. Honaker. Grocery Keeper in Bath County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bath County, Owingsville, p. 7.
Find A Grave, "Charles Wesley Honaker (September 9, 1839-August 2, 1901)," Memorial #25675791, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/25675791 (accessed March 15, 2019)
